structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Place of meetings -- Residents of area eligible as members.
law.text: Meetings of the members of a housing authority (including any housing authority created pursuant to KRS 80.010 to 80.250) may be held anywhere within the perimeter boundaries of the area of operation or territorial jurisdiction of an authority or within any additional area where the housing authority is authorized to undertake a housing project, and any person may be appointed as a member of the housing authority who resides within boundaries or such additional area, and who is otherwise eligible for such appointment under KRS 80.320 to 80.610 or KRS 80.010 to 80.250, as the case may be.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 29, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 70, sec. 16.
